MAdmin.bas

Controls developer access to hidden worksheets and other workbook cleanup utilities.

Information
Dependencies

MGlobalConstants.bas

References

Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 2.8 Library

Compatibility

Excel 2013, 2016

License

This file is licensed under the MIT license.

Author

Jason Boyll

jason[xxx].boyll@gmai[xxx]l.com

Functions
ToggleDevMode
Public Sub ToggleDevMode()

Toggles developer mode on or off. Checks visibility of SQL tab to determine developer mode (visible = on, hidden = off). Queries user for password if enabling developer mode.

EnableDevMode
Public Function EnableDevMode(
ByVal password As String
) As Boolean

Unhides developer worksheets (SQL, Test, and all other output sheets).  Requires password.

DisableDevMode
Public Sub DisableDevMode()

Hides developer worksheets (SQL, Test, and all other output sheets except Connection).

CleanUpWorksheets
Public Sub CleanUpWorksheets()

Cleans up worksheets after data population.

Reset
Public Sub Reset()

Iterates through each worksheet and clears all data sheets from row 6 down.  Resets visibility of each data sheet to xlSheetVeryHidden.
